page.title: 10Shopping survey
page.content: From our survey it was shown that the majority of people in the area studied, did most of their general shopping in Brampton, going to Carlisle only for items like furniture, clothes and shoes. On Front Street and Main Street there are some 54 shops. The majority of shops sell food in one form or another. These include large and small supermarkets, greengrocers, health foods, cakes, fish and chips and a Chinese Take-away. There is a special shop selling hunting, shooting and fishing tackle and another selling window blinds. There is also a shop selling videos and 2 antique shops, clothes, electrial goods and hairdressers. Other services include banks, building societies, estate agents, solicitors, accountants and garages. Brampton is therefore a 'self-sufficient' town.
